text: Abhay Ganpathrai Bharadwaj (2 April 1954 â€“ 1 December 2020) was a Ugandan-born Indian politician, activist and lawyer. He was born in Kampala, Uganda. Bharadwaj was a member of the Rajya Sabha from 22 July 2020 until his death. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He also was a member of the national Law Commission from 2016 to 2018. Bharadwaj died of COVID-19 on 1 December 2020 at a hospital in Chennai, India at the age of 66.Gujarat Rajya Sabha MP Abhay Bharadwaj passes away, PM Modi condoles his death ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Chennai Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Indian activists Category:Indian lawyers Category:People from Chennai Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians
title: Abhay Bharadwaj
